Āsevana
Cūḷantaraduka
Sanidassanaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Āsevana
42.
632Anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—  purimā purimā anidassanā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ anidassanānaṃ khandhānaṃ…pe…  anulomaṃ gotrabhussa…  anulomaṃ vodānassa…  gotrabhu maggassa…  vodānaṃ maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
